# Configuration.IsDgmlGraphEnabled property

If specified, requests a DGML graph of the iteration that contains a bug, if a bug is found. This is different from a coverage activity graph, as it will also show actor instances.

```csharp
public bool IsDgmlGraphEnabled { get; }
```
